title: Yas has needed a nerf for a long time. Why hasn't it happened?
body:
I would LOVE to hear Riots RATIONALE, spelled out, on WHY they don't addressed them.

Shit they put out TONS of arguments and articles explaining why they had to rework aatrox and then rework him into something not Aatrox. 

Its almost like they only explain the shit when they know what they are doing is wrong, and just stay silent when its convenient.

I have never encountered such a spineless company. They deserve to be put out of business.

> Yas has needed a nerf for a long time.

This premise is flawed. According to Riot, he's at about a 48% WR. However, due to his high ban rate, he'll probably get a nerf if he's ever balanced.

Also, his W is bugged right now such that it basically doesn't work a lot of the time, so he's struggling more than usual these days.

Ye

the moment Yasuo shows up as a meta pick in high elo (aside from mains) or in pro play he gets instantly nerfed
Because he doesn't need one and you not liking him isn't enough of a reason to nerf him?

Ya? You know who the boards never complain about ? Champs like {{champion:2}} . You know who is always complained about? champs like {{champion:157}} .

Even his passive is WAY too strong compared to ohters. He gets free damage, massive amounts and a great shield for early laning. His build paths are strong and easy and scale hard.

Fuck that. He needs to be toned down a little. If he doesnt need a nerf, and he is a good 5% or more higher in win rate than champs like Olaf, then does Olaf need a buff?  Should everyone just get stronger to adjust to him?

Op. GG.
